name: Lark Rise Farm Walks (Route 2 - Yellow Markers)

ai.summary: A short, easy 2.8 km walk along Lark Rise Farm, Route 2 with Yellow markers. Suitable for families and casual walkers, offering rural scenery and gentle gradients.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly farmland paths: flat to gentle inclines with gravel, compact soil and grassy sections. Expect gates or stiles and potential mud after rain; wear sturdy footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Distance is 2.8 km; allow 45-60 minutes. Stay on public rights of way and close gates behind you. Be mindful of farm traffic and livestock; watch for uneven ground, mud, and weather changes. Carry a map or charged phone, water, and basic first-aid supplies.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation (or route description)
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn for the best conditions; winter walks are possible but expect mud, shorter daylight hours, and colder temperatures.

seo.title: Lark Rise Farm Walks Route 2 – 2.8 km Easy Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Lark Rise Farm Walks Route 2, a 2.8 km easy hike in the UK marked by Yellow markers. Enjoy rural scenery, gentle trails, and family-friendly terrain.
